title: Integration
content:
Hi everyone.  
The event for which I had designed this identity is long since over but I quite like the form and would like to work on it and refine it further.Initally I had reversed the 2 to form the 7 but then the 7 looked a little odd so I had to crop a bit of its tail while extending it for the 2. So please tell me what I need to do to it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022125122im_/http:/typophile.com/files/convo_4300.jpg)

Vinu Chaitanya  
Graphic design student  
India
author: vinu

comments.content: I would capitalize institute and design in the school's name to be proper.

How about ball terminals on the end of each numeral? Align the second line with 2006 using the diagonal created by the oblique type.

Tim
